title: .HelveticaNeueInterface-M3 and the lowercase "e"
content:
Is [this](http://web.archive.org/web/20131107072120/http:/www.flickr.com/photos/alfonsobozzelli/10241124423/) weird?  
It's the font used in iOS stocks apps (.HelveticaNeueInterface-M3). More detail here [http://t.co/PF5zgCGzEU](http://web.archive.org/web/20131107072120/http:/t.co/PF5zgCGzEU "http://t.co/PF5zgCGzEU")
author: abozzelli
